author: Sam Mcneil
title: Leaving Wuhan: Getting into virus-hit city was the easy part
description: BEIJING (AP) — Getting into Wuhan was the easy part. New virus infections had fallen to almost zero and travel restrictions were easing. As a 76-day lockdown neared its end, journalists and...
content:
BEIJING (AP) Getting into Wuhan was the easy part.
New virus infections had fallen to almost zero and travel restrictions were easing. As a 76-day lockdown neared its end, journalists and others were allowed to enter the city in central China where the globa… [+5115 chars]
